snippet: The British tenor Mark Padmore has recorded Britten’s Serenade and Nocture with mesmerizing singing and penetrating intensity.
abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews recording Britten: Serenade for Tenor, Horn and Strings, and Nocturne Finzi: Dies Natalis featuring tenor Mark Padmore.
lead_paragraph: The British tenor Mark Padmore has recorded Britten’s Serenade and Nocture with mesmerizing singing and penetrating intensity.

headline.seo: Britten’s Serenade and Nocturne by Tenor Mark Padmore
headline.main: Britten’s Serenade and Nocturne by Tenor Mark Padmore
